title: Bug 130068[Regression] Report Parameter window doesn't pop up when previewing a report with parameters.
description:
Description: When previewing a report with parameters, the Report Parameter window fails to pop up. This issue seems to be a regression in the software. 

Steps to reproduce: 
1. Create a report parameter without a default value. 
2. Drag the parameter to the report layout. 
3. Attempt to preview the report.
OB: When previewing a report with parameters, the Report Parameter window fails to pop up.
EB: The Report Parameter window should pop up when previewing a report with parameters.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 

1. Create a report parameter without a default value. 
2. Drag the parameter to the report layout. 
3. Attempt to preview the report.
